title: CS50 Finance
description: This is the problem set 9 from CS50 2021 and also it is my first web programming experience about HTML, CSS. It is a web application developed with Flask and allow user to 'buy' and 'sell' the stock with the help of the API provided by IEX

title: ALE Shop
description: This is my final project for CS50 and also is my first web application built from sratch. It is a simple online shopping site using Flask to develop

title: ALE Auction
description: This is the project 2 (Commerce) for CS50's Web Programming with Python and JavaScript and the project assignment require to build a eBay-like e-commerce auction site with Django

title: ALE Network (Twitter-like web app)
techStack: React, Django, Bootstrap, JWT auth, SQLite
description: This is the latest web app that I build. It is the project 4 for CS50's Web Programming with Python and JavaScript and I try to use React JS, Django, JWT auth and etc to build a Twitter-like social network website for making posts and following users

title: Human Tetris with Depression Level Detection (Final Year Project)
techStack: Unity, MediaPipe, Python, Microsoft Azure, Terraform, Docker
description: A pose mimicking game application that utilizes computer vision framework (MediaPipeUnityPlugin) to enable players to control a game character with a webcam. The pose and relevant data stored in Azure Table Storage via API with Azure Function and used to build a regression model for predicting user depression levels based on their body movements. Terraform is being used for managing and provisioning the necessary Azure resources for this project.
